entry.title: Friday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 50 late this morning. High 8. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries in the afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Friday 31 March 2023
